ValidationRule.description: I made changes but I reverted them. - ESC
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL( EZ_IO_Complaint_Type__c, "EZ-IO Driver Related only"), ISBLANK(If_insertion_s_were_successful_how_was__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill the required information in the EZ-IO Driver Related only Section
